sentences.sContent: Leslie jumped to her feet, overturning her chair.
sentences.sCn: 莱斯莉一跃而起，碰倒了椅子。

sentences.sContent: His car overturned, trapping him inside.
sentences.sCn: 他的汽车发生侧翻，把他困在了里面。

trans.tranCn: 翻倒 turn over or capsize)； 推翻， 倾覆(to cause the ruin or destruction of； overthrow)
trans.tranOther: if you overturn something, or if it overturns, it turns upside down or falls over on its side
